title: Translate PDF documents from Google drive folder with DeepL
author: Milorad Filipovic

readme:
This workflow will translate all your PDF documents from specified Google Drive folder to the desired language. Translated files will be automatically uploaded to the original folder.

### Required accounts

1ï¸âƒ£ Google Drive account  
2ï¸âƒ£ [DeepL developer account](https://www.deepl.com/pro-api?cta=header-pro-api) and API key

### How to setup?

1ï¸âƒ£ Setup your google drive folder url, target and source language in the configuration node  
2ï¸âƒ£ Connect your Google Drive account with all Google Drive nodes  
3ï¸âƒ£ Setup HTTP header credentials that should be used for HTTP nodes in the template (replace `yourAuthKey` with your DeepL API key)  
![Deepl HTTP Header auth](https://i.imgur.com/t4zOVgc.png)  
4ï¸âƒ£ Set your DeepL header credentials in all HTTP nodes
readme_html:
This workflow will translate all your PDF documents from specified Google Drive folder to the desired language. Translated files will be automatically uploaded to the original folder.

Required accounts

1ï¸âƒ£ Google Drive account
2ï¸âƒ£ DeepL developer account and API key

How to setup?

1ï¸âƒ£ Setup your google drive folder url, target and source language in the configuration node
2ï¸âƒ£ Connect your Google Drive account with all Google Drive nodes
3ï¸âƒ£ Setup HTTP header credentials that should be used for HTTP nodes in the template (replace yourAuthKey with your DeepL API key)

4ï¸âƒ£ Set your DeepL header credentials in all HTTP nodes
